meanings.definition: Showing or feeling love or sexual attraction
meanings.sent1: The amorous couple held hands and gazed into each other's eyes.
meanings.sent2: She blushed when he gave her an amorous look.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's amorous behavior towards the cat was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with amorous hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: His amorous gestures towards her were as clear as day.

meanings.sent1: He had an amorous nature, always seeking affection.
meanings.sent2: The amorous poet wrote passionate verses about his beloved.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's amorous pursuit of acorns was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with amorous flowers, reaching towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: Her amorous gaze lingered on his face, full of longing.
